about_the_game:
You are a child who lost your mother at a young age soon after you lost your father. You're trying to hold on to life in a small town called Tawny with your stepmother. Stepmom has a clothing shop, and you are an assistant in a photo studio. Losing your father a few years after your mother's death caused great trauma to you. For this reason, you wanted to go to the house of the step-aunt, who lives in SunCity for a short time, and get through the mourning process quickly. That's where your intrigue, sex, fun and career adventure starts for you.

Sun City is a choice-driven, adult Visual Novel that includes in the demo version:
400+ static images and 6+ animated scenes
30 minutes game time
An intriguing mystery
4 original songs
Interacting with a variety of women
Obscene scene with a woman
Episode 1 Demo

content_descriptors.notes: The game explicitly contains sexuality, drug use and violence. The story is not intended for players who are in a dark period of their lives. If you get offended easily or are just looking for a fun game this is not the game for you.

Joın Discord


About the Game

You are a child who lost your mother at a young age soon after you lost your father. You're trying to hold on to life in a small town called Tawny with your stepmother. Stepmom has a clothing shop, and you are an assistant in a photo studio. Losing your father a few years after your mother's death caused great trauma to you. For this reason, you wanted to go to the house of the step-aunt, who lives in SunCity for a short time, and get through the mourning process quickly. That's where your intrigue, sex, fun and career adventure starts for you.

400+ static images and 6+ animated scenes

name: Sun City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Losing your father a few years after your mother's death caused great trauma to you. You wanted to go to the house of the step-aunt, who lives in SunCity. That's where your intrigue, sex, fun and career adventure starts for you.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
